page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE OF-
page.content: Mrs Jones works at Penshell bakery. She gets up at 7.30am on monday mornings and has two slices of bread and marmalade, and one cup of tea. she leaves for work at 8.45am.When she doesnt go to work,she does housework and cooking until lunchtime.She has lunch at 1pm.She has a snack and a cooked meal for tea,sometimes this is a roast.After tea she has a rest and somtimes does ironing until bedtime. Mrs Moore gets up at 7.30am,for breakfast she has toast and a cup of coffee.At 8.30,Gill brings baby Frances for Mrs Moore to look after while she goes to work.For dinner,Mrs Moore has a sandwich and cup of coffee then she does the housework.During the summer,Mrs Moore works from 6.30pm -10.30pm at Penstowe manor assisting the chef preparing the evening meal for the tourists staying there
